title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.24 - Entry upon ramp and apron areas restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1260.24 - Entry upon ramp and apron areas restricted

State Regulations

No person shall enter upon the public landing area, public ramp and apron area, public passenger ramp and apron area or the public
cargo ramp and apron area of an air terminal without permission except persons
assigned to duty therein or authorized representatives of the Port Authority, or passengers entering upon the public ramp and apron areas for purposes of
embarkation or debarkation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1260.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
